titleStmt.title: Some things of weighty concernment proposed in meekness and love by way of queries to the serious consideration of the inhabitants of Aberdeen which also may be of use to such as are of the same mind with them, elce where in this nation, added by way of appendix to a book intituled Truth cleared of calumnies.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.

titleStmt.title: Some things of weighty concernment proposed in meekness and love by way of queries to the serious consideration of the inhabitants of Aberdeen which also may be of use to such as are of the same mind with them, elce where in this nation, added by way of appendix to a book intituled Truth cleared of calumnies.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Barclay. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Signed & dated at end: Given forth the 11. Month 1670, by R.B.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
